message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with acoustic modelling for code-switched speech recognition, which involves natural language processing and speech technology.
- cs.SD (Sound) is also likely as the paper focuses on acoustic modelling for speech recognition.
- cs.LG (Learning) is relevant as the paper discusses semi-supervised training to increase the size of the training data, which is a common approach in machine learning.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is relevant as the paper deals with developing an automatic transcription system for multiple languages.
- cs.SI (Signal Processing) is also relevant as the paper deals with processing speech signals for recognition.
